title: Digital Programmable Thermostats, Bicycle Storage, Walk-in Closets
posting_body: ['YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'FIND LUXURY AT OUR GLENDALE, CA APARTMENTS FOR RENT  Get the walk-ability you love and the luxury you expect from your downtown Glendale, CA apartment home.', 'Explore a new studio, one, or two-bedroom apartment with a boutique ambiance that keeps pace with your busy lifestyle and uncompromising taste.', 'The Harrison is a friendly and intimate community offering a true sense of connection and a real chance to get to know your neighbors in a relaxed setting.', 'Old school inspiration meets a new school approach to life at these Glendale apartments for rent.', ' You’ll appreciate spacious and modern residences ideal for entertaining as well as relaxing.', 'Enjoy day to night amenities that include a rooftop terrace with incredible views of the city, onsite fully equipped fitness center, resort-inspired pool & spa, onsite CVS Pharmacy and much more.', 'A few steps from your door, discover major shopping and dining.', 'L.A.’s nightlife, culture, and the Studios are only a short drive away.', ' Contact us today to book a tour and discover your new haven at our Glendale, CA luxury Apartments.', 'Welcome to distinction on your terms.', 'Welcome to The Harrison!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Wi-Fi Capable', 'Frigidaire Gallery Series Energy Star Stainless Steel Appliances with Gas Ranges', 'Full Size Front-loading Frigidaire Washers and Dryers', 'European Styled Cabinetry with Modern Porcelain Tile Designer Backsplashes', 'USB Charging Ports in Kitchen and Bedrooms', 'Walk-in Closets', 'Bicycle Storage', 'Outdoor Yoga', 'Rooftop Deck with Expansive City and Mountain Views with with Entertaining Bar with TV', 'Quartz Calacatta Nuvo Kitchen Countertops', 'Dog Run', 'Area Bocce Ball Courts', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
